verses.name: Mark 12:4
verses.text: And again he sent unto them another servant; and at him they cast stones, and wounded him in the head, and sent him away shamefully handled.

verses.name: Mark 12:5
verses.text: And again he sent another; and him they killed, and many others; beating some, and killing some.

verses.name: Mark 12:6
verses.text: Having yet therefore one son, his wellbeloved, he sent him also last unto them, saying, They will reverence my son.

verses.name: Mark 12:7
verses.text: But those husbandmen said among themselves, This is the heir; come, let us kill him, and the inheritance shall be ours.

verses.name: Mark 12:8
verses.text: And they took him, and killed him, and cast him out of the vineyard.
